paragraph: Thorleifs was a Swedish dansband, formed in 1962 in Norrhult, Kronoberg County, Sweden and led by Thorleif Torstensson. The band that sings in Swedish and many other languages, also released albums in German. It also took part in Melodifestivalen 2009 with the song "Sweet Kissin' in the Moonlight" but did not proceed into the finals.
Guitar, lead vocals and saxophoneThorleif Torstensson (1962-2012)Guitar and vocalsMagnus Bergdahl (1968-2008)
Magnus Håkansson (2011-2012)Keyboards, guitar and saxophoneHans Magnusson (1962-2012)Trumpet and vocalsAnders Kjell (1962-1969)
